product_name: Yakima SkyBox 12 Carbonite Cargo Roof Box
long_description: Ideal for hauling gear for 2 campers, the Yakima SkyBox 12 Carbonite Cargo Roof Box features a dimple-textured lid that reduces drag, resulting in less noise and more stability. And it looks great! 12 cu. ft. is perfect for hauling gear for up to 2 campers and will fit snowboards and skis up to 215cm long. SkyBox 12 Carbonite Cargo Roof Box is made from up to 80% recycled ABS plastic. Designed with internal lid stiffeners for added rigidity. SuperLatch(TM) security helps ensure your lid is secure to its base to protect your gear. Quick-release mounting hardware fits Yakima round, square, factory and aerodynamic crossbars. Dual side opening conveniently allows the box to be opened from either the right or left side. Rear of the cargo box is tapered for improved hatch clearance. SKS lock cores are included with the Yakima SkyBox 12 Carbonite Cargo Roof Box.
short_description: Ideal for hauling gear for 2 campers, the Yakima SkyBox 12 Carbonite Cargo Roof Box features a dimple-textured lid that reduces drag, resulting in less noise and more stability. And it looks great!
